resources.string:
Symptomator is a medical app designed to fulfil all your medical needs. 

This app packs the following features: 
			Symptom checker 
			First aid information 
			Medical Services
Call your national Emergency number in one click, wherever you see the circular call button with a cross inside.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Check if you want to repeat on different days

Based on the symptoms you entered, we have calculated matches for possible conditions. The conditions are listed in order of how closely your symptoms match those conditions. This information is meant to be informational, and is not intended as medical advice or a diagnosis. Information you read here should not replace the advice of your healthcare provider. You should always seek the advice of a qualified healthcare provider about any questions you may have about a medical condition. As always, if you think you have a medical emergency you should call your doctor or the emergency services immediately.
Facebook handles\n(click on name to open profile)
Find the registered doctors within 10 Km (6 miles) around you. \n\nClick on a Marker to view the doctor\'s details, such as the phone number, address, location and website
Find the registered hospitals within 10 Km (6 miles) around you. \n\nClick on a Marker to view the hospital\'s details, such as the phone number, address, location and website
Get all the first aid information you need, right under your fingertips.
Get directions to the registered doctor nearest to you. \n(uses Google Maps)
Get directions to the registered hospital nearest to you. \n(uses Google Maps)
